title: 2 Bed near Harvard! Heat Included--448 Broadway
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts - Porter Square', 'Classic Pre-War Stucco Bldg Steps to Harvard', 'Cambridge / Harvard Square / Mid Cambridge', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#134320', 'Features', 'Cats allowed.', 'Dogs are negotiable with Landlord.', 'Six-Family structure, Brick architecture, on the 3RD floor.', '8 minute walk to the T.', 'Permit Street Parking.', 'Coin-op washer in basement, Coin-op dryer in basement, Cable Ready.', '1 minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', 'Apartment Summary', 'Great location!!', 'Total steal for 3rd floor, 2 bedroom apartment.', 'Polished hardwood floors, a large galley  kitchen, and a great porch/balcony.', 'Heat and hot water included.', "It's only 8 minutes to Harvard Sq and the T!", ' (Reference #134320)', 'Apartment Details', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Location:', 'Cambridge/Harvard Square', 'Kitchen:', 'Galley.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Electric Stove.', 'Reference:', '#134320', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Bath:', '1', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Ryan Moore', 'Call:', '860-519-3644', 'Please mention reference #', '134320', 'Email:', 'ryan.moore @ <URL>', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
